documentation.author: Jane Holz
documentation.purpose: Add *UR PC RFLX MICROS to * PC UA dipstick when pH is verified

statements.statement: SELECT T.MNEMONIC, T.TASK_ASSAY_CD FROM DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T ORDER T.MNEMONIC

SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY ,C1.DESCRIPTION ,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 1901 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
/* SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 1901 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE */

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_RESULT_STATUS
templateDefinitions.definition: a RESULT_STATUS result exists for PROCEDURE

statements.statement: SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY ,C1.CODE_VALUE ,C1.DISPLAY ,C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 1901 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 and cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) between c1.begin_effective_dt_tm and c1.end_effective_dt_tm ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT T.MNEMONIC, T.TASK_ASSAY_CD FROM DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T ORDER T.MNEMONIC

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_RESULT_EVAL
templateDefinitions.definition: PROCEDURE RESULT_STATUS result is EVALUATION VALUE
templateDefinitions.description: Incoming discrete task assay, status, result value

statements.statement:
SELECT T.MNEMONIC, T.TASK_ASSAY_CD FROM DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T ORDER T.MNEMONIC
/* SELECT MNEMONIC = DECODE(O.SEQ,O.MNEMONIC, T.SEQ,T.MNEMONIC, FILLSTRING(50,' ')) , TYPE = DECODE(O.SEQ,'ORDER_CATALOG', T.SEQ,'TASK_ASSAY ', ' ') , TYPE_CD = DECODE(O.SEQ,O.CATALOG_CD, T.SEQ,T.TASK_ASSAY_CD, 0.0)
FROM (DUMMYT D WITH SEQ = 1), order_Catalog_synonym O, DISCRETE_TASK_ASSAY T, CODE_VALUE C
PLAN D JOIN ( O WHERE O.ACTIVE_IND=1 JOIN C WHERE O.CATALOG_TYPE_CD = C.CODE_VALUE AND C.DISPLAY_KEY = 'LABORATORY') ORJOIN T WHERE T.ACTIVE_IND=1
ORDER MNEMONIC
SELECT S.MNEMONIC FROM ORDER_CATALOG_SYNONYM S, CODE_VALUE C WHERE S.CATALOG_TYPE_CD=C.CODE_VALUE AND C.DISPLAY_KEY = "LABORATORY" */

SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY ,C1.CODE_VALUE , C1.DISPLAY ,C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 1901 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 and cnvtdatetime(curdate,curtime3) between c1.begin_effective_dt_tm and c1.end_effective_dt_tm ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY

SELECT distinct n.source_string from nomenclature n, code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning = "ALPHA RESPON" and cv.active_ind = 1 join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd = cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " order n.source_string_keycap

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_ADD_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME to add ORDERS with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT for OPT_SCOPE as OPT_LINK
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare orderables to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_VALUE or inherit it from OPT_LINK for orders setup by GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already set
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SET_ORDER_DETAIL_DT_A
templateDefinitions.definition: SET_ACTION ORDER_DETAIL equal to OPT_ANCHOR_DT or inherit it from OPT_LINK, offset OPT_OFFSET_DAY days, OPT_OFFSET_HOUR hours and OPT_OFFSET_MIN minutes for orders setup in group(s) GROUP_NAME

column.value: Add details' value if it's not already
Empty detail's value (for NEW order only)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server
